======
README
======

Let's test the source code with our custom checker:

  >>> import p01.checker
  >>> import p01.dashboard
  >>> skipFileNames = [
  ...     'chart-2.4.0.js',
  ...     'chart-2.4.0.min.js',
  ...     'chart.bundle-2.4.0.js',
  ...     'chart.bundle-2.4.0.min.js',
  ...     'd3-3.5.17.js',
  ...     'd3-3.5.17.min.js',
  ...     'eventsource-0.9.7.js',
  ...     'eventsource-0.9.7.min.js',
  ...     'grid.css',
  ...     'grid.min.css',
  ...     'jquery-1.12.0.js',
  ...     'jquery-1.12.0.min.js',
  ...     'jquery-1.12.0.min.map',
  ...     'jquery.knob-1.2.13.js',
  ...     'jquery.knob-1.2.13.min.js',
  ...     'justgauge-1.2.9.js',
  ...     'justgauge-1.2.9.min.js',
  ...     'lodash-4.17.4.js',
  ...     'lodash-4.17.4.min.js',
  ...     'p01.dashboard.css',
  ...     'p01.dashboard.js',
  ...     'p01.dashboard.min.css',
  ...     'p01.dashboard.min.js',
  ...     'rickshaw-1.6.0.js',
  ...     'transparency-0.11.0.js',
  ...     'transparency-0.11.0.min.js',
  ... ]

  >>> checker = p01.checker.Checker()
  >>> checker.check(p01.dashboard, skipFileNames=skipFileNames)
